thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Trimble Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.14

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Trimble Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.14
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Trimble Inc:
* TRIMBLE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.39 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.14 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 21 PERCENT TO $708.4 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.36 TO $0.40 * SEES Q1 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.16 TO $0.20 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $700 MILLION TO $730 MILLION * U.S. TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT RESULTED IN A PROVISIONAL TAX EXPENSE IMPACT OF $85 MILLION IN QUARTER
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.37, REVENUE VIEW $674.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.39, REVENUE VIEW $696.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
